title: Idean UX Summit - The Art of Storytelling in Design
desc: Everyone knows great design means great business. Especially in the product world, the winning philosophies always center upon the keystones of responsiveness, usability, and simplicity. Sometimes, however, it can be hard to convince key decision makers of the immense value that accompanies brilliant design when there are often few quantifiable measures. ?At our next UX Summit in December our discussion will centre around the? ?- how content and storytelling shapes the process of effective design and product management. In San Francisco we had amazing, top speakers from  ,  ,  ,  , and  . HYDE Sunset
